features: [Rustic Distressed Look] The distressed tray is hand crafted in surface finish,adds rustic touch to your decor.The hand crafted distressed finish is truly artistic accent decor pieces,rustic style crafted to accentuate your home decor.

[Premium Material] This wood serving tray is about 30% less weight than ordinary wood,sturdy and has the perfect size for what you want to create.Our round wooden tray is well crafted of natural paulownia wood,lightweight but wear-resistant and tough.

[Multi-Use] A versatile decor,Our round wooden tray is a perfect addition to your home, living room or farmhouse decoration.This measures outer 11.8" size,a perfect size for sphere candles,small plant,tv remote,cosmetics storage,vases,jewelry,salt,pepper,perfume,spice and so on.

[Perfect holiday gift] The decorative tray will look great in any setting.This is a very creative decorative trays,suitable for girlfriends or mothers.This wooden tray also can be used as a Thanksgiving,Christmas or holiday gift.

[Washing and Care Instructions] Wash small wood tray with soapy water and dry with towel. Do not soaking for a long time or exposed to the sun to prevent cracking. Another important point is do not put it in the dishwasher, microwave or oven.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wooden tray
reviews.reviewText: Worked perfect for my Advent wreath!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely + lightweight + great bang for your buck = one terrific tray! 👍🏼
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I am just all caps WILD about this rectangular, decorative solid wood tray!!! Here’s why I’m so bonkers for it:☑️ I really dig the rustic Paulownia wood construct! I’ve got a meditation table, and some other jewelry display pieces made from the same wood, and I LOVE that it’s feather-light, sustainable, and has that vintage vibe I just adore.☑️ Great size makes for excellent versatility! Perfect for mantels, coffee tables, dressers, and more. I also use this tray for display at craft fairs for my gemstone jewelry. The size (and lightness!) make it ideal for travel.☑️ Fantastically economical! The price point is a value for what you receive.🔘 Do note as previously mentioned, the wood is incredibly lightweight, a tad soft, and porous, so you’ll want to transport and/or place items with some care to avoid scratching and such. On the plus, because of the rustic, old world look, a few scratches or minor dents only add to the character. 😉An excellent, minimalist, solid wood decorative tray, that’s wonderfully versatile, well priced, and great for anyone wanting to add a touch of warmth and rustic flair to their home (or craft fair booth!). Highly recommended! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality wood
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice tray. I put it on a ledge space that had some random items set on it and it looks much better. The tray isn't cheap-looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect base for table centerpieces
reviews.reviewText: I really like this tray, I have used it as a base for my flower vase and also to place candles on and other decor. It is not very heavy, which I like since I am putting things on/in it and then it is not difficult to move off the table when we are eating. It is big enough to put a 3-wick candle on plus some other small decorations if wanted, but I actually like the simplicity of just a candle or vase- it dresses the vase or candle up just a bit and makes things look more intentional. It has that rustic worn look but is not rough to the touch and does not have splinters, despite looking like it might. It's great as a centerpiece that you can customize, but could easily put this on a larger bathroom vanity with little jars and a candle, or a coffee table, bedroom, etc depending on where you want to use it. Not sure how it would tolerate the humidity of a bathroom but as long as you have good ventilation I think it would be fine. Nice product, I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Ok Finish
reviews.reviewText: This plate is light and sturdy. The stain isn’t perfect with some blemishes but you could always use a furniture stain pen to cover up the imperfections.
